tier_1_determinative.ipc_sections_charged: 420, 465, 468, 471 read with 34 IPC, Section 4(a) of the Maharashtra Prohibition of Gambling Act, Section 25(c) of the Indian Telegraph Act

tier_3_contextual.place_of_offense: a flat in front of the MCA Cricket Stadium on Mumbai-Pune Expressway

tier_4_procedural.case_title: Aman Kumar Singh vs. The State of Maharashtra
tier_4_procedural.court_name: High Court of Judicature at Bombay
tier_4_procedural.counsel_for_appellant: Mr. Farooq Sothi, Advocate a/w. Rupali Sawant i/b. S.P. Associates
tier_4_procedural.sections_invoked: Sections 420, 465, 468, 471 IPC, Section 4(a) Maharashtra Prohibition of Gambling Act, Section 25(c) Indian Telegraph Act
tier_4_procedural.acts_and_sections: Indian Penal Code, Maharashtra Prohibition of Gambling Act, Indian Telegraph Act

residual_details.additional_facts: The FIR was lodged by Police Constable Nitin Lokhande from the Robbery Cell, Pimpri Chinchwad, following a raid on 26.5.2023. The Applicant was not named in the FIR, and there was no material indicating his direct or indirect involvement according to the learned APP. The Applicant's anticipatory bail was initially rejected by the Sessions Court based on incorrect submissions that he helped procure SIM cards.
